operation.command: update B{ENV_NAME}.ADRESSE set ADREML = 'gaetan.cesaro+testnonprisencompte@gmail.com' where ADRCAF = '02018000007994'

select 1 from sgengpp.gpp_email a  inner join sgengpp.gpp_moyen_contact m on m.id = a.id_fk_moyen_contact  inner join sgengpp.gpp_personne_physique p on m.fk_personne_physique = p.numero_interne  where p.matricule = '540003'  and m.date_fin_validite is null and a.adresse like 'gaetan.cesaro@gmail.com%'
update B{ENV_NAME}.ADRESSE set ADRPA1 = 'RES LES BAMBOUS APT 2' where ADRCAF = '02018000007994'
